name: C'est la vie proto
description:
Once upon a time in the country of high stone pillars, similar to Meteora, lived an elephant Jack.
He loved life, his friends butterflies and flowers.
And he loved to dream. Dreaming about how he will gain wings and be able to fly. Fly up over their native places and see the world in a new light. But, as it often happens ...

Game for LDJam43

Controls:
* Touch or click on buttons for menu navigation

* Touch or click anywhere for walk/jump in different game modes

#ldjam43 #ldjam
